abstract: Meg Whitman is about to announce her retirement after a decade running eBay, a report says. The company faces challenges from Google and Amazon, and it may need to make more radical changes than has been the style of the cautious Ms. Whitman.
snippet: Meg Whitman is about to announce her retirement after a decade running eBay, a report says. The company faces challenges from Google and Amazon, and it may need to make more radical changes than has been the style of the cautious Ms. Whitman.
lead_paragraph: The Wall Street Journal is reporting that Meg Whitman is retiring as chief executive of eBay. In March, Ms. Whitman, 51, will have served in the position for 10 years.

headline.main: Report Says Whitman to Leave After Conservative Decade at eBay
